Summary: sitting outside to smoke and saw bright amber colored object with no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsHave to smoke outside. Went out around 11:00 p.m. to smoke last cig. of the day. Looked east toward Great Divide and saw a bright light in the sky. Object was shaped like a cylinder and was amber colored. Tried to hear any noise but there was none. Object hovered in sky for a few minutes and started moving toward the south west. Color was solid except for a brighter band of light in the middle of object. Watched for about 10 to 15 minutes until it went behind a cloud. Came inside, made sure all doors and windows locked, turned off the lights and went to bed. ( This is the second time I have observed UFO's but did not think to report the first time. First time I observed objects there was actually 3 of them. Same shape as above described. There was one large object and 2 smaller ones. Watched them for about 10 minutes.This happened in Jan 2013.) Because of the altitude here the sky is usually very clear.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Granby
There were no other sightings in Granby on or around April 4th 2013
